sentences.en: A signal - relay satellite would transmit information from the telescope to Earth.
sentences.cn: 望远镜接收到的信息将由转播信号的一颗卫星转播到地球上.

sentences.en: Can you relay this to Mr. Li?
sentences.cn: 你能传话给李先生 吗 ?

sentences.en: He quickly relayed this news to the other members of staff.
sentences.cn: 他马上就把这个消息转告给了其他员工。

sentences.en: He was there by invitation , to impart information and to relay requests.
sentences.cn: 他应邀坐在那儿, 随时准备提供情况和回答咨询.

sentences.en: Lewis has recently recovered his fitness and will clash with Christie in the 4x100m relay.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯近来恢复了状态，将在4×100米接力赛中和克里斯蒂一决雌雄。

sentences.en: Manned'stationary'satellites are used to relay and broadcast electromagnetic communication signals.
sentences.cn: “固定不动的”人造卫星被用来转播及广播电磁通讯信号.
邮递员将接转你的信件.

sentences.en: More than a thousand people outside listened to a relay of the proceedings.
sentences.cn: 外面有一千多人收听了整个进程的转播。

sentences.en: She wanted to relay the carpet in her new home.
sentences.cn: 她想重新铺设她新房子的地毯.

sentences.en: Six teams competed in yesterday's relay race.
sentences.cn: 六个队参加了昨天的接力赛.

sentences.en: The broadcasts were relayed by satellite.
sentences.cn: 这些电视节目通过卫星进行转播。

sentences.en: The church was crowded, so electrical machinery was used to relay the service out to the people.
sentences.cn: 教堂里挤满了人, 所以就用电机设备把礼拜仪式向外面的人转播.

sentences.en: The game was relayed by satellite to audiences all over the world.
sentences.cn: 这场比赛通过卫星向全世界的观众进行了转播。

sentences.en: The gauge relies upon a sensor in the tank to relay the fuel level.
sentences.cn: 油表靠油箱里的感应器来显示燃料的液位。

sentences.en: The satellite will be used mainly to relay television programmes.
sentences.cn: 这颗人造卫星主要用途是转播电视节目。

sentences.en: They tried out for the relay race.
sentences.cn: 他们参加了接力赛跑的选拨赛.

sentences.en: Will you relay a message to him when you see him?
sentences.cn: 你见到他时,给他带个口信好 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: [电]继电器；接替，接替人员；驿马

phrases.tran_cn: 电力系统继电保护原理
热继电器；热过载继电器
火炬传递；火炬接力；圣火传递

trans.tran_cn: 接力比赛，中继设备，轮换者

trans.tran_en: if radio or television signals are relayed, they are received and sent, especially so that they can be heard on the radio or seen on television
to pass a message from one person or place to another
